about_the_game:
This set includes sleeves featuring the characters from Dear Days 2.
Acquired sleeves will be added to your collection.

・Yu-yu Kondo
・Danji Momoyama
・Tohya Ebata
・Megumi Okura
・Zakusa Ishigame
・Tomari Seto
・Mirei Minae
・Raika Koshiba
・Urara Haneyama
・Michiru Hazama
・Masanori Iseki
・Taizo Kiyokura
・Akina Myodo
・Nao Inabe
・Suo Yobitsugi
・Mikoto Saito
・Hikari Myodo (Future)

※This content is the same as the content included in the Season Pass item "Additional Card Unlock Pass."
※Duplicate purchases are not allowed.
